captions.text:
• From imaginary friends resembling people
who had died, to an infant that speaks of

a fireplace where dead babies go, we count
15 of the creepiest things little kids have

ever said to parents and babysitters
15 - Braids,

• A person walking around their aunt's house
when they spotted their 4 year old cousin

April sitting on the stairs pulling funny
faces

• When asked, April mentioned she was copying
the lady with the braid, pointing towards

a bean running parallel to the stairs, pulling
invisible faces

• April claimed the invisible woman's braids
were around her neck for some reason, hanging

by her braid
• The funny faces April seemed to be copying

were like someone gasping for air
14 - Joe (matthewo),

• A father who had a best friend named Joe
that committed suicide - Joe's wife called

the father blaming herself for Joe's death
• The dad consoled her and reminded her

that Joe loved her very much and that she
was surely not to blame - he hung up the phone

and checked on his kids who were fast asleep
• He went back downstairs only to come back

up and find his son Matty awake, silently
weeping on the side of his bed

• When the dad asks what's wrong, his son
replies "Rick, it's not her fault. I love

her. It's not her fault" - then rolls back
onto the bed fast asleep

• The father was terrified
13 - Captain,

• A mother to a 7 year old child that claims
her son had an invisible friend known as "The

Captain", an old man with a long beard
• The kid told his mum that the captain

informed him when he grows up, his job will
be to kill people, and that the captain would

tell him exactly who it was that should be
murdered

• The kid cried, saying he didn't want to
kill when he grew up, but that the captain

said he didn't have a choice and, even worse,
he'd get used to all the killing after a while

12 - Dead Babies (PersonMcNugget),
• A man and his wife who bought an old house

in Western Canada, one time renovating their
basement when their friend came around to

visit
• This friend was alone with their 2 year

old son, who was barely old enough to talk
let alone understand what he was saying, when

the kid took his hand and led him over to
the chimney, to which he looked up and said

clearly and fluently, "That's where the dead
babies go"

• There was nobody that would have told
him that, no older kids to say it as a joke

- this 2 year old kid just said it out of
the blue

11 - Dead Cop,
• A person's 4 year old niece who would

blame things she did on an imaginary friend,
as well as watch scooby doo with her

• When asked, the niece explained her mysterious
friend was dead, and that she was a police

officer like her father - first meeting her
when she was inside her mother's belly before

being born
• A few months before that time, a policewoman

named Tracy had been hit by a train in a town
right next to the one she happened to be in

- and before she died, she was heavy into
scooby doo

10 - Previous Life,
• Between the ages of 2 and 6, this one

woman's son would tell her the same story
about how his soul picked her to be his mother

• In a bright room with people lined up
like dolls, a suited man would lead the infant

down the line and pick his own parents
• At an early age, the kid had a fascination

with World War 2 fighter jets, even describing
their individual parts and the region they

were used in
9 - Faceless,

• A person looking after their little cousin
from Montana, one who claims to have an imaginary

friend he could only describe as the "Creeper
Man"

• It lives in his mum and dad's bedroom,
watching their whole family all night long

for whatever reason, but when the kid was
asked about the creeper man he gave a chilling

answer
• When asked what he looks like, the kid

merely mentioned "Oh, he doesn't have a face"
8 - Yellow Eyes (RachelSays),

• A woman with a 3 year old son who would
turn to her and say "Mommy, the very big man

with big yellow eyes is looking at you"
• He then pointed at nothing, laughed and

said "He's hiding now, he will come when you
are sleeping"

• Another night, the kid said, "I'm not
going to be four. I'm going to die, and you

will put me down into the hole - the man told
me, and I will be scared by then you'll die

too and come with me"
• Which is a clear indicator your son is

a spawn of the devil
7 - Staring,

• One babysitter watched a few kids while
their parents were off watching a movie - a

pretty simple thing, they just put them to
bed and spent the whole night watching T.V

• The next day, one of the kids told his
parents something incredibly strange: that

the babysitter had NOT watched T.V all night,
that instead they'd stood in the bedroom doorway

and stared at the kid for a very long time,
smiling

• The babysitter was so confused that they
didn't even know how to respond

6 - Lady on the Roof (aamiina),
• A 3 year old sleeping in her bed when

she started screaming, the mother walked in
to find out what's wrong only to hear her

kid yelling the words "Remove the lady from
the roof" over and over, pointing towards

the corner of the roof
• Not too long after while flicking through

some photos, the mother found a picture of
her own mother who died when she was young

- and when her 3 year old kid saw the photo
she flipped out

• Despite never seeing her grandma before,
she pointed directly at her and said "she

was the lady on the roof"
5 - Mystery Mother (universe_hopper),

• A child with the recurring dream of living
with a different family to their own - vivid

memories of a different mother
• When the child told their actual mother

about the dream, she reveals the day she gave
birth - a mysterious woman was cradling the

baby in her arms, and when she spotted the
mother, she put the baby down and ran off

• The description of this woman lined up
with the kid's description of the mother from

their dream, and both of them had always felt
like they belonged to different families - as

if their souls had been mixed up
4 - Premonitions,

• This one kid who sleep walked every night,
turning off all the electronics in the house,

grabbing all the kitchen knives, aligned them
in a circle, sat in the middle and talked

gibberish
• When their dad tried to get them out of

the circle, the kid would pick up a knife
and shout "He will get you" until he backed

away, then continue to sit there for 30 minutes
• The next day when asked about what happened,

the kid spoke of a nightmare about this man
dressed in all black with fire red light behind

him, speaking of awful things and how it was
him doing it

3 - Chop (joysprite),
• A mother with a 3 year old daughter who

turned around one day to say "Don't you remember,
Mommy? Before, when you were the daughter

and I was the mother, they came and chopped
all our heads off. Chop, chop, the whole village."

• Even though the mother was taken aback
and a little shocked, she tried to wave it

off saying "Fortunately I don't remember the
head chopping"

• To which her daughter chimed in, "Well
it happened and I remember it really well"

making vicious chopping motions with her hands
2 - Jack in Hell (spnoelle),

• A kid's stepfather named Jack who sexually
molested his mother when she was young, excluded

from her family's life when she got older
• The kid didn't know any of this, and Jack

died with the mother getting informed by telephone
that day - the kid walked into the living

room to say "He's screaming in my room and
won't stop."

• When she asked who was screaming, the
kid said the name Jack, and that he won't

stop screaming that he's in hell
• She asked her kid to describe this Jack,

which they did - even down to the hospital
gown Jack wore when he died

1 - Dream Bullets (sheldon711)
• The author's 6 year old cousin who lost

their grandfather to a robbery at the convenience
store he ran when the armed robber pulled

out a gun and shot him
• To lessen the blow, the cousin's mother

told her that grandpa had passed away in his
sleep and that he was in heaven now

• To which the little girl replied, "Are
you sure he wasn't shot?", which her mother

denied, and the girl explained "Because I
heard gunshots in my dream last night"

title: 15 Creepiest Things A Child Has Ever Said

comments.text:
Abou 3 years ago I was sleeping and I felt like someone was watching me so 
I opened my eyes but I did not see anybody so I went back to sleep and then 
I kept on feeling as if someone was there watching me so this time I

comments.text:
I do believe in ghosts, and what kids say is real and it is their 
imagination sometimes that makes you see things, when I was a little kid me 
and my sister used to sleep in the same room since we were so poor, I 
always had a major problem of waking up in the middle of the night and 
having a seizure caused by a same damn dream I had every day, dream went 
like this, wherever we lived there was a store I always used to go down, 
and there was always a pail of dirt right next to the store, in the dream, 
I walked out of my house, went down the stairs and started walking to the 
store and instead of going into the store I went into the dirt, and started 
drowning, that caused me waking up and having a seizure.. then my sister 
wakes up every night screaming saying she sees a man standing right next to 
her and staring at her,  for some reason, I was always scared to go into 
that room and sleep alone, I have seen a ghost too, but it is pointless 
talking about it here, since there are so many ignorant people out here.﻿

comments.text:
back in 2001 me and my big brother had a friend named Zaire, an 
afro-american chubby guy who was member of a street gang in my city called 
GT 187, we always hang out with him down at the port close to my 
neighbourhood, he was quite tough when it came to crimes, and he was hated 
in some parts of our town because of him and some of his friend's violent 
behavior, however, in 2002 we was contacted by his mother and was told that 
zaire had been stabbed to death down at the local mall in our city, we 
we're so freaked out and sorry for his death, as the time went on and me 
and my brother got over it until a day when we we're at a walk in the port 
we used to hang out with zaire at. it was a cold and late sunset and we was 
on our way home until we both saw the shadow of an afro-american teen stand 
on the rocks at the port laughing at us  for at short time before he 
disappeared out in thin air, to this day we believe it was zaire's ghost we 
saw and are still freaked out a bit over it﻿

comments.text:
When I was younger, my mother told me a story of what I did when I was 
around seven. I sometimes had crying fits in the middle of the night, but 
this time it was different. She told me these screams were like howls. And 
when she came running in my room my eyes were shut but I was sitting up 
right. But she said the thing that scared her to death is when I began to 
scream repeatedly,"Stop throwing stones at me!" ..... I also used to sleep 
walk into her room and just stand there, watching her. Then I would subtly 
poke at her and when she finally jolted awake I would simply ask,"May I go 
to the bathroom?"﻿

comments.author: Mobeen Akram

comments.text:
Around 5 years ago when I was 15 (not sure exactly when it was) My mom was 
in an abusive relationship with my sociopathic stepfather which she 
couldn't get out of, because we'd moved all around the country, our 
relatives all have a big grudge etc. so we had nowhere to live if they had 
split up

Back on point: my mom went to her old friends house to have her tarot cards 
read and my older brother by 1 year Danny, went with her, I was home 
playing computer games and my stepfather was somewhere in the house just 
being a prick as he did.
When my mom came home, my mom was talking about it to my stepdad and he was 
having a joke about it sceptically, Dan said he felt kind of sick and down, 
but he didn't know why, suddenly he broke down crying badly, and when my 
mom went to console him, he screamed and pushed her away, claiming that he 
felt something grip his spine. He said that he felt my moms pain.

Baring in mind that my brother is a hard nut who went to a young offenders 
prison, used to constantly get into trouble with the police and even armed 
security back on the barracks we used to live on, prior to that house (my 
stepdad was in the army) he was used to being shouted at, beaten and 
punished.

So why did he start bursting into tears and going crazy literally an hour 
after my moms tarot reading?﻿

comments.author: Kevin Resendiz

comments.text:
When I was about 5 years old, I was laying in my parent's bed at night with 
them while they slept. The lights were out and there was this documentary 
on TV about alien abductions that they fell asleep watching. When I was a 
kid, I was really scared of alien's for some reason so I was laying there 
terrified to begin with. Also I was laying on the very edge of the bed, 
next to a large window with long drawn curtains. 

Well all of a sudden, the TV turned off by it's self. So it was pitch black 
in the room and my heart was about to beat out of my chest.  After a few 
minutes, I hear a woman's voice call my name from behind the curtains. It 
sounded like she was singing my name.  Till this day, I still can't explain 
what the hell that was and it scares the shit out of me. I still wonder. 
 Im 24 now.﻿
comments.author: Angela T
